import React from 'react'; import { Outlet, Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../hooks/useAuth'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import LanguageSelector from './LanguageSelector'; const Layout = ({ type }) => { const { user, signOut } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { t } = useTranslation(); const handleSignOut = async () => { try { await signOut(); navigate('/login'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error signing out:', error); } }; return (
{/* Header */}
{t('app.name')}
{/* Navigation Links */}
{type === 'client' && ( <> {t('nav.dashboard')} {t('nav.chat')} )} {type === 'therapist' && ( <> Dashboard Clients )} {type === 'admin' && ( <> Dashboard Behaviors Users Subscriptions )}
{/* Language Selector */} {/* Profile dropdown */}
{user?.email}
{/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile menu, show/hide based on menu state */}
{type === 'client' && ( <> Dashboard Chat )} {type === 'therapist' && ( <> Dashboard Clients )} {type === 'admin' && ( <> Dashboard Behaviors Users Subscriptions )}
{/* Mobile Language Selector */}
{user?.email}
{type}
{/* Main content */}
{/* Footer */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} AI Coach & Therapist Platform - Inspiration AI / Gvargas Inc.

); }; export default Layout;
